Manage_Schools.title: Basic Information
Manage_Schools.description: Fill in the school's basic information including name, email, and phone number.

Manage_Schools.title: School Logo
Manage_Schools.description: Upload your school logo - this will appear on reports and the school portal.

Manage_Schools.title: School Details
Manage_Schools.description: Add your school's tagline and complete address details.

Manage_Schools.title: Domain Setup
Manage_Schools.description: Set up your school code prefix and choose domain type (default or custom).

Manage_Schools.title: Finish Setup
Manage_Schools.description: Click "Submit" to create your school profile and proceed with the setup.
